attributes.action: permission fees for cemeterys,need to be stopped
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: local councils are charging (cemetery permission fees) this is on top of funeral bills, the permission fees are for letters added to a exsising headstone,the fee is £72 this money does not have to be paid if the 2nd persons been added to the grave , does not have there name added to headstone,coucil say it is so no one can put anything offensive on headstone, however , before the headstone can have anything added to it, the funeral parlor have to send to the council all words to be added , for approvel,so why pay them another £72 there is no charge for a exsisting headstone to be replaced back on the grave,or for the headstone checking when replaced,not untill another name as been added ,which as all ready been cleard by the council, this fee as to be paid before headstone can be replaced , this is robbing off all ready bereaved people and must be stopped
